ResourceHeader.Description: Defense Meteorological Satellite Program, DMSP-S20 20th flight unit of the DMSP Block 5D series, 6th (last) of the Block 5D-3 series. Main missions: cloud imagery and MW imaging/temperature/humidity sounding. Substantial contribution to Space weather.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: DMSP Data Manager, NOAA National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, NESDIS
